Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: The latest Federal Budget reveals a $15 billion package of cost of living measures including potential cuts to South Australian road projects. The Budget also aims to accelerate the country's hydrogen industry through $2 billion Federal funding with Whyalla named as a potential beneficiary for the funds. However the budget falls short of recommendations made by the government's economic inequality taskforce gaining criticism from the Greens. Surpluses are anticipated to occur this financial year before deficits are expected to return.
